## Black Myth: Wukong Purple-Veined Peach Pit Location
The Purple-Veined Peach Pit can be found at The Verdure Bridge Shrine in The Webbed Hollow's Middle Hollow. From the Shrine, follow the path towards the lanterns on the left. Head through the opening on the right by them and open one of the chests in the area to get the Soak.
img_below_text: Soaks are far more plentiful than the drinks for your gourds. They are scattered throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
